meanings.definition: A company or group of people authorized to act as a single entity and recognized as such in law.
meanings.sent1: Many corporations provide jobs for people in the community.
meanings.sent2: The corporations in the city contribute to its economic growth.
meanings.sent3: The corporations decided to have a dance-off to settle their legal dispute.
meanings.sent4: The corporations stood tall like giants in the business world.
meanings.sent5: The word 'corporations' echoed through the courtroom, emphasizing their legal status.

meanings.definition: A large company or group of companies authorized to act as a single entity.
meanings.sent1: Global corporations have offices in multiple countries.
meanings.sent2: The tech corporations are constantly innovating new products.
meanings.sent3: The corporations threw a party to celebrate their merger.
meanings.sent4: The corporations dominated the market like a powerful force.
meanings.sent5: The image of corporations as juggernauts of industry is deeply ingrained in society.
